paper_abstract: Autopilot design for a yacht is more difficult than other type of motor-powered marine vessels because of the special characteristics of the motion of a yacht response to wind and other sea conditions. Robustness is one of the most important properties for the yacht steering autopilot. This paper develops a new method of tuning PD controllers by using an H-infinity control strategy. It is well known that the H-infinity control design normally yields a controller which is much more robust against disturbances. Hence the proposed PD tuning method via the H-infinity theory enhances the robustness of the PD autopilot for the yacht steering control.
paper_title: Yacht adaptive self-tuning PID control: An H-infinity approach
